objects.text:
• Premium Romance Experience
• Elegant Burgundy & Gold Design
• Specially Crafted for Couples
• Creates Sensual Memories

Ignite Passion 
• Savor Every Moment 
• Unwrap Romance

product_details.name: NOOKY - Luxurious Intimacy Chocolate for Couples | Premium Romance Experience
product_details.description:
• Premium quality chocolate designed specifically for couples
• Elegant burgundy packaging with gold rose emblem
• Unique gift for romantic occasions and special moments
• Beautifully crafted chocolate squares with distinctive design
• Perfect blend of romance and indulgence
• Sophisticated presentation in premium gift box
• Creates sensual memories with gourmet chocolate experience
• Ideal for anniversaries, Valentine's Day, or romantic evenings
• Exclusive intimate chocolate formula
• Comes in elegant, discreet packaging

banner_details:
This banner design showcases a luxurious chocolate product intended for couples, with a romantic and premium feel. The layout uses a dramatic diagonal split between deep black and rich burgundy backgrounds, intersected by accent lines and subtle golden decorative motifs. Text layers “heading_1” and “heading_2” use an elegant serif typeface in metallic gold to announce the luxury theme prominently at the top. The sub-brand is introduced with a bold sans-serif typeface in the “subheading” layer. Below, the "description" and "tagline" text layers communicate emotional and product-specific messages using refined serif fonts. The “price” text stands out in large golden typography, paired with a call-to-action “cta” inside a rectangular “cta_button” in matching gold. A photorealistic product representation appears on the right side under "product_image", lending visual appeal and credibility.

**Color Palette:**
- Gold: #e1cf8d
- Deep Black: #000000
- Burgundy: #66001a
- Dark Burgundy: #4d0013
- Off-white text: #f7f7f7
product_color: The product image features a luxurious and romantic color palette, ideal for creating an advertisement banner that speaks to intimacy and indulgence. The dominant color is a deep burgundy (#4C0D22), setting a mood of passion and elegance. This rich shade is complemented by warm rose gold accents (#B76E79) used for the typography and rose illustration, adding a sophisticated highlight. The chocolate squares introduce a smooth milk chocolate brown (#6F4E37), grounding the visual in richness and flavor. Swirls of earthy red and cream beige (#A23E48 and #E3C7B3) at the base create a sensual blend, enhancing the premium and intimate appeal.
